rukus.text: 55|46|arau yiye tara pratipalakara sanmukhata upasthita horaara bhaya posana karae, tara babe ache duta jannata.
55|47|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|48|ubhaye'i bahu phala sakhabisista.
55|49|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|50|Ubhaya jannatata ache prabahamana duta nijaraa
55|51|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|52|ubhayara majata ache pratyeka phala du'i du'i prakara.
55|53|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|54|tata sihamte a'uji bahiba enekuraa bichanata yara abhyantarabhaga ha'ba sinkhaperae tairai sukomala; arau ubhaya jannatara phala-mula thakiba nikatararti.
55|55|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|56|tata thakiba sbamira prati drsti simitakarai raupahisakala, yisakalaka itipurbe kono manuhe athaba kono jine sparsa karaa na'i.
55|57|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|58|sihamta yeniba hiraa arau mukuta.
55|59|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|60|uttama kamara pratidana uttamara bahirae arau ki haâ€™ba parae
55|61|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|62|arau se'i duta jannatara bahirae'o arau duta jannata ache.
55|63|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|64|jannata duta haiche ghana se'i'ujiya.
55|65|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|66|e'i duta jannatata ache ucchalita duta nijaraa.
55|67|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|68|tata ache phala-mula, khejura arau dalima.
55|69|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|70|se'i jannatasamuhara majata ache caraitrararti, raupahi ramani.
55|71|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|72|camiyanaborata suraksita hai thakiba hurasakala.
55|73|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|74|Yisakalaka itipurbe kono manuhe athaba kono jine sparsa karaa na'i.
55|75|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|76|sihamte a'uji bahiba se'i'ujiya dalicha arau dhuniya sinkhapara gadiyukta asanata.
55|77|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|78|barakatamaya tomara pratipalakara nama, yijana mahamahima arau mahanubhara.
